named-native-query.name: Dish.findByStatusId
named-native-query.query: SELECT d.* FROM dishes AS d WHERE d.status_id = :statusId

named-native-query.name: Dish.findByCategoryId
named-native-query.query: SELECT d.* FROM dishes AS d INNER JOIN dish_category AS dc ON d.dish_id = dc.dish_id WHERE dc.category_id = :categoryId

named-native-query.name: Dish.findByCategoryIdAndStatusId
named-native-query.query: SELECT d.* FROM dishes AS d INNER JOIN dish_category AS dc ON d.dish_id = dc.dish_id WHERE dc.category_id = :categoryId AND d.status_id = :statusId

named-native-query.name: Dish.updateStatusId
named-native-query.query: UPDATE dishes AS d SET d.status_id= :statusId WHERE d.dish_id = :dishId

named-native-query.name: Dish.updateRemainQuantity
named-native-query.query: UPDATE dishes AS d SET d.remain_quantity = :remainQuantity WHERE d.dish_id = :dishId
